ygData.subject: Unable to fully crawl inline CSS surrounded by HTML comments
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Please forgive any newbie errors. I have been working with Heritrix/Wayback for a couple years, but not in a very in-depth manner. I am trying to crawl
